title: Yosemite National Park: Park Home
body: Yosemite  Not just a great valley, but a shrine to human foresight, the strength of granite, the power of glaciers, the persistence of life, and the tranquility of the High Sierra.First protected in 1864, Yosemite National Park is best known for its waterfalls, but within its nearly 1,200 square miles, you can find deep valleys, grand meadows, ancient giant sequoias, a vast wilderness area, and much more.              Plan Your Adventure and Explore Yosemite   What is there to do in Yosemite? This common question is a difficult one to answer... because there are so many answers.            Lodging, Camping, and Wilderness Permits   Hoping to spend the night in Yosemite? Learn more about lodging, camping, and obtaining wilderness permits.         Take Care of Your Park and Have Fun!    How can you help four million people? Learn how to visit Yosemite National Park in a way that is fun, memorable, and safe.
